attacks.name: Pulse Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or more damage is done to Light Jolteon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Thunder Needle
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If you get 2 or more heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
